A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Grew up on the OT\, liked the prequel trilogy. Star Wars purist. Loved the film.

Star Wars is bold again. As it should be. People just aren't happy their fan theories didn't come true and want to preserve their pristine view of certain characters. This film dares to question that\, and some fans can't get around that. It's hilarious.

Loved the film. Go watch it.
